column4: Has anyone tried installing Ubuntu on a Mac Mini? Is it possible? I know Macbook Air is really hard to install on if you dont want to run parallels.
i had it installed on a macbook pro 2010 13", it was pretty easy
yes on the macbook pro it is. But Macbook Air has a special EFI that doesnt allow you too.. was thinking that maybe Mac Mini has the same.
well i think the 2011 mba has the same efi as the mac mini 2011
